flawed_nl_solution:
He buys 2*5=<<2*5=10>>10 drinks for his friends
So he orders 10+6=<<10+6=16>>16 total drinks.
The cost of the drinks was 16*6=$<<16*6=96>>96
So his order came out to 96+14=$<<96+14=110>>110
The tip came out to 110*0.3=$<<110*0.3=33>>33
So his order cost 110+33=$<<110+33=413>>413
Adding in the cover charge means it cost 413+20=$<<413+20=433>>433

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 143.0, not 413.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
